biotools.summary: Simulation program to generate patterns of single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) data in a region that is linked to a biallelic site targeted by selection. The software was developed by modifying the commonly used Hudson’s ms simulator

bioschemas.name: mbs
bioschemas.summary: Simulation program to generate patterns of single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) data in a region that is linked to a biallelic site targeted by selection. The software was developed by modifying the commonly used Hudson’s ms simulator
